summary: A standalone follower. There are two versions. COS CBBE and UUNP special body.
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is a Standalone follower, no other mods are needed in order for it to work.

Body
COS CBBE body with fair skin complexion, now her weight is 80.
UUNP special body with leyenda skin weight 80.

class
spell sword

spells
flames
fire bolt
flame atronach
healing

perks
armsman
fighting stance
apprentice destruction, conjuration
novice restoration
augmented flames
agile defender
custom fit

location
sleeping giant inn river wood

She is marriageable.

Armor
Armor in screenshots are not contained in this file. They belong to various other mods found on the Nexus. She will use whatever you give her.

Q: Aren't there other Scarlet follower mods on the nexus already?
A: yes but i feel none of them come as close as Commonroutes and cravemode's preset so I made this mod for myself using it.

credits
Scarlett Johansson preset by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1121292]commonroutes[/url] and [b]CraveMode[/b]
SG hair pack 268
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The eyes of beuty[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]LogRaam[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG brows[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393/?]Hello Santa
[/url]Leyenda skin by heroleyenda
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair skin complection[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236/?]Hhaley[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]CBBE bodyslide[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url]
Special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738/?]Ashes2asherz[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]make a follower kit[/url][/center]
author: BaldMike021
